Link.description: Link, you must specify arrow type

Link with text.description: Link with text, you must specify arrow type

Link dotted.description: Link with text, you must specify arrow type

Dotted link with text.description: Link with text, you must specify arrow type

Bidirectional link.description: Bidirectional link, you must specify arrow type

Bidirectional link with text.description: Bidirectional link with text, you must specify arrow type

Inheritance link.description: Inheritance link (solid line with closed arrow)

Composition link.description: Composition link (solid line with filled diamond)

Aggregation link.description: Aggregation link (solid line with open diamond)

Association link.description: Association link (solid line with open arrow)

Dependency link.description: Dependency link (dashed line with open arrow)

Realization link.description: Realization link (dashed line with closed arrow)

Class-specific note.description: Note attached to a specific class

Note for flowchart.description: Note attached to a specific class

Flowchart Class Definition.description: Sets a wannabe class in a flow diagram

General note.description: General note (not attached to any class)

body: | Inheritance     | --\|>      | Solid line with closed arrow    |
| Composition     | --*        | Solid line with filled diamond  |
| Aggregation     | --o        | Solid line with open diamond    |
| Association     | -->        | Solid line with open arrow      |
| Solid Link      | --         | Basic solid link (no arrow)     |
| Dependency      | ..>        | Dashed line with open arrow     |
| Realization     | ..\|>      | Dashed line with closed arrow   |
| Dashed Link     | ..         | Basic dashed link (no arrow)    |
Link type legend (Markdown).description: Markdown table legend for all class diagram link types

Diagram Title.description: Inserts a title for the diagram in Mermaid format

Class Diagram.description: Initializes a Mermaid class diagram with a title

Flowchart Diagram.description: Initializes a Mermaid flowchart with a title (options: 'TB', 'LR', etc.)

Sequence Diagram.description: Initializes a Mermaid sequence diagram with a title

Gantt Diagram.description: Initializes a Mermaid Gantt chart with a title and date format

ER Diagram.description: Initializes a Mermaid ER (Entity-Relationship) diagram with a title

Pie Chart.description: Initializes a Mermaid pie chart with a title

Journey Diagram.description: Initializes a Mermaid journey diagram with a title

Mindmap Diagram.description: Initializes a Mermaid mindmap diagram with a title

Class in Class Diagram with access modif.description: Creates a class within a classDiagram

Class in Class Diagram Basic.description: Creates a class within a classDiagram

Class in Class Diagram with Label.description: Creates a class within a classDiagram

Sequence participant.description: Creates participant at that exact point
